definition[0]: a religious ceremony for burying or cremating (=burning) someone who has died
example[0]: The funeral will be held at St. Martin’s Church.
example[1]: Hundreds of mourners attended the funeral of the two boys.
example[2]: the minister who conducted the funeral service
example[3]: Nelson’s funeral procession down the Thames
example[4]: Ramdas set fire to the funeral pyre.
